reviews.text: We just love this place... The owners really give the personal touch, nothing is too much trouble. It's very dog and child friendly. Can't imagine CK without Moosh!
reviews.author: Sarah L. (via Google Maps)

reviews.text: The heart of the village. Itâ€™s our go-to for a Saturday morning coffee and pastry. The staff know everyone by name, it just feels like home.
reviews.author: Ben W. (via Google Maps)

reviews.text: A lovely, welcoming atmosphere and the cakes are simply unreal. So nice to have a proper independent coffee shop in the neighbourhood.
reviews.author: Chloe G. (via Google Maps)
